body_html:
yes, I have exactly followed the instructions, up to point three where it is declared

./configure
bazel build --config opt \
  //tensorflow/java:tensorflow \
  //tensorflow/java:libtensorflow_jni

yes, I tried to create the package from the source with Cuda 10
body:
yes, I have exactly followed the [instructions,](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/java/README.md) up to point three where it is declared

````
./configure
bazel build --config opt \
  //tensorflow/java:tensorflow \
  //tensorflow/java:libtensorflow_jni
````
yes, I tried to create the package from the source with Cuda 10
